alert.note: Alert for Edmonson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN WARREN AND SOUTHEASTERN EDMONSON COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM CDT... At 257 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Plum Springs, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Brownsville, Plum Springs, Smiths Grove, Oakland, Chalybeate, Rhoda, Bristow, Girkin and Nick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
